page.title: 03School Organisation
page.content: {Our school}has four computers.We have a younger, middle and older team.Each team has two or three classes.Our hall is 13m by 9m.We have two play_ grounds a field a playmound, swimming pool and a playgroup.Inside we have two kitchens and a library.In the older team we have two classes.We use a planner sheet as a daily record. We choose what we do art, language, topic or maths and we choose where we sit. {Willowbank Junior School}built 1970. Entrance in Duffield Rd. Semi_open plan plus main hall. Swimming pool built 1975. Grounds cover four acres. Playing field plus netball, football pitches. Infant school alongside. 190 pupils. Mixed sex school. 7 teachers + head teacher. No uniform. Intake 45 pupils yearly. One head teacher since school opened. Many after school activites.
